attr.title: Xroar
attr.desc: XRoar emulates the Dragon 32/64; Tandy Colour Computers 1, 2 and 3; the Tandy MC-10; and some other similar machines or clones.  Put coco bios .rom files in bios folder and rom .cas file in gamedata folder.
attr.inst: The compatible rom files need to be included in the ports/xroar/bios folder for example: bas13.rom and Place color computer game files in the appropriate ports/xroar/roms subfolder.
